verses.text: Mamin Jehov치, cham wal ab'an tas swala'. Ochanh k'elan t'ayin ayic sja sik'son in k'ool.
Scham wal ab'ani a swalan in b'a t'ayach. In reyal ach, in Diosal ach, yuj chi' a t'ayach ol in lesalwoc.
Mamin Jehov치, t'a junjun q'uinhib'alil tzin awaj t'ayach. Ha sq'uinhib'i swalan in b'a t'ayach, tzin tanhwan a pactzitan t'ayin.
Val yel Mamin, malaj a gana t'a chukal, max yal-laj yaj heb' chuk t'a a tz'ey.
Ha heb' syik'chaanh sb'a, manh ol aj heb' t'a ichanh, max schalaj a k'ool heb' sk'ulan chukal.
Ol a satel heb' tz'esani. Tza chacankanel heb' ixtum anima yet' heb' milumcham anima.
Ha inxo ol in k'och t'a a kajnub' yuj a niwan wach'k'olal t'ayin. Ol wal wach' lolonel t'ayach t'a emnaquil t'a a kajnub' icnhej yaji.
Mamin Jehov치 tojol ach toni, yuj chi' cuchb'ej in t'a a b'eal, checlitej a b'eal t'a wichanh yujnhej heb' ajk'ool tzin maclani.
Malaj wal lolonel yel syal heb', anhej tas chuk sna heb'. Yuj tas syal heb' chi' sb'atkan heb' anima t'a chamel, syal wach' lolonel heb' t'a chab'satil.

Ach in Diosal, ak' wal cot yaelal t'a yib'anh heb'. Cotokab' t'a yib'anh heb' yuj juntzanh chukal sna heb' t'a yib'anh heb' yetanimail. Yujto manh jantacoc schukal heb', ik'kanel heb' t'a skal a chonhab', ina to spitej wal sb'a heb' t'ayach.

Axo pax masanil heb' tzach ak'anoch yipoc sk'ool jun, tzalajokab' sk'ool heb'. Elokab' yav heb' t'a tzalajk'olal t'a masanil tiempo, yujto tza colel heb'. Ha heb' tzach xajanani, tzalajokab' heb' uuj.
Yujto a ach Jehov치, tzak' a wach'k'olal t'a heb' wach' syutej sb'a. Tza colanel heb' yet' a wach'k'olal.
